dialogue.text: You may have damaged my machinery, but you'll never defeat me! I'm the master of synthetic music!
I'm not afraid of you, Danny Dorito, I'm going to stop you from taking over the world!
You're just a boy, what could you\npossibly do to stop me? I'm the master of my craft!
...I'm not just any boy, I'm the one who's going to save the world...by rap battling you?
[this is actually what the AI wrote. I literally couldn't get it to come up with anything different after that.]
